channel.title: Renaming client? help a noob out :) 508
channel.description:
hey im just wondering how to rename my client so the title is the name of my server (in the blue bar at the top) and also hwo to change the background image. I know it has something to do with GUI file (atleast i think it does) but all my files are named like "class1 sub 1" "class 1" "class 20 sub 15" etc.
a quick insight on what to do to change the client name and background would be much apretated, thanks :D

item.title: Renaming client? help a noob out :) 508
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Dev Dark_Dev
item.description:
@Dark_Dev wrote:

didn’t work i just need to change the title and background just the files are not named by name - they are named by class etc

Read full topic
item.source: Renaming client? help a noob out :) 508

item.title: Renaming client? help a noob out :) 508
item.dc:creator: @The_Arcanian The Arcanian
item.description:
@The_Arcanian wrote:

There’s a nice tool called bitsearcher. Goes with the server sources in most cases.
Just search for current name in files.

Read full topic
item.source: Renaming client? help a noob out :) 508
